column1: Topic title: Non Muslim BN parties to meet PM on Hadi s motion

column8: text

http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/376443Non-Muslim BN parties to meet PM on Hadi’s motion this week21 March 2017BN component parties will meet this week to discuss the Bill on the Syariah Courts (Criminal Jurisdiction) (Amendment) Act 1965 or Act 355 that seeks to enhance the Syariah Court punishment.MIC president Dr S Subramaniam said all top leaders of component parties will hold a meeting with Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak who is also BN chairperson."We will wait until the meeting, only after that will we know what has been proposed and what will be our stand," he told reporters at the Parliament lobby yesterday.He said in a meeting with Najib two weeks ago, MIC had stated its stand and the prime minister understood MIC's position on the issue.Subramaniam said the MIC had not received any information about the government's decision to table Act 355 in Parliament this session.On March 17, Deputy Prime Minister Ahmad Zahid Hamidi said the government will table Act 355 soon.- Bernama
